title: skript插件如何在给玩家发送的消息内显示变量值？
txt_content:
例如：
message "<light green>技能正在冷却 剩余时间： {skill.%player%} 秒"复制代码
这么给玩家发送消息，假设玩家名是Jack，{skill.Jack}的值是1，发送的消息却是：
技能正在冷却 剩余时间： {skill.Jack} 秒
我应该要怎样才能让他发送的消息变为这样呢？：
技能正在冷却 剩余时间： 1 秒

replies.txt_content:
插件自己给的例子有空可以看看的……
摘抄自-command with cool down.sk
message "You have to wait %difference between a minute and {_waited}% before you can use this command again!"
摘抄自-kill counter.sk
message "You have killed %{kill counter.%player%.kills_session}% mobs and players in this life out of %{kill counter.%player%.kills_total}% kills in total."
message "Your maximum kill streak is %{kill counter.%player%.kills_session_max}% kills in one life."
所以，最后一行引用变量那里改成%{skill.%player%}%就可以了
一个能用的例子
on rightclick with axe:
        set {skill.%player%} to 233
        send "请再等 %{skill.%player%}% 秒"
